website_summaries.verdict: A great idea combining a probiotic with joint support supplements, but not all dogs like the tablets.
pros: Many owners are happy with the improvement in their dogs’ digestion, with reduction in gassiness, and other problems
cons: Many dogs don’t like chewing or swallowing the tablets, requiring some creativity to give them
Like any supplement, doesn’t work for all dogs

customer_reviews.title: These really help my dog's digestive problems.
customer_reviews.text: One of my miniature longhaired dachshunds has a problem with loose stools. I noticed her stools were well formed after about a week of using the probiotic tablets. I put them inside of pill pockets; to make them tasty for her, since she doesn't like to chew tablets. She hasn't had any bowel problems since I started using Amazing Probiotics and I only give her one tablet daily. If I were to change anything, I would make the tablet into a soft chew, but that's a minor issue. I would recommend these probiotic tabs for anyone who wants to improve the bacteria culture in a dog's digestive tract, even if there wasn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: Had my dogs on the Purina ProFlora probiotics and a separate glucosamine chrondroitin chew, so bought this to make life easier since it's a 2-in-one. We've been using it for over a month and I'm questioning the efficacy of the probiotic in this chew. One of my dogs has digestive trouble and compared to the Purina probiotics, this product is not helping with the loose stool or odor. He's back to having diarrhea and gas so we're switching back ASAP. I did NOT receive an incentive for this or the Purina product I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Park

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1 product
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced two products that I had been using - a Probiotic and a Joint supplement.I have a 110 lb 9 year old Boxer and I give him 5 tablets every morning. This product has worked better than any product I have used for my pets "gas" - and I have used many different products. As far as the Joint Supplement - it seems to be just as effective as all of the other products I have used. My dog also loves the taste so there are no problems getting him to take them
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Pesce

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics that really Work!
customer_reviews.text: Our standard poodle male seems to have very sensitive guts (so much for "intestinol fortitude"). He was having loose stools spontaneously, and always inconveniently, for no apparent reason. I decided to try these "Amazing Probiotics" and have been really impressed. My husband had a bright idea our boy didn't really need it, so we stopped for about 2 weeks....hubby started giving it to our boy! It really works!
customer_reviews.author: K. Holtby

customer_reviews.title: Dog had allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: On day two of use, I woke up to my German Shepherd in full allergic reaction. Swollen face, raw eye lids from rubbing while I slept and full on scratching and shaking. Unfortunately I had to stop feeding this to all my dogs and we are returning to our original brand. She is allergic to pumpkin and this was a reaction compared to a weeks feeding in just two pills. Caution if your dog is sensitive or allergic to pumpkin.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like NutraPet, But They're Not.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these by mistake as the packaging very closely resembles the NutraPet probiotics. Over the past month or so, my boxer has developed a skin allergy on her hind quarters with hair loss. I ran out of these Amazing Nutritional Probiotics and very quickly, the red spots are going away and her hair is growing back in. Nothing has changed with her diet. Just stopped giving her these probiotics and her issue is going away. There's no way it's a coincidence. I'll be sure to order the NutraPet instead of these.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: My dog has some digestive diarrhea issues and also at ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has some digestive diarrhea issues and also at 13 has arthritis so I give him glucosamine/chondrontin. I thought this might kill two birds with one stone, but I don't think it's quite as effective as the Propectalin that that have gotten from our vet in the past for diarrhea issues. And I found that you can purchase Propectalin online also at a cheaper rate (20 cents per tab vs 50 cents per tab from the vet), so I'm getting that this time around!
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product That Works!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle comes with 120 tablets which I thought would last 3 months, but it turns out that you need 3 a day (1 pill for every 25 lbs of dog.). Before the tablets, our dog (a shepherd) had very smelly gas and bad breath, but after a few days on the probiotics, both were gone! These were well worth the money. Our dog seems to love the pills and eats them like candy. So that makes it easy to give her. If your dog suffers from gas, then I would suggest you try these probiotics. They work!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 100 stars if I could!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old German Shorthaired Pointer has had IBS for two years and has had the most TERRIBLE gas. He has had at least 40-50 farts daily that are so bad we have to leave the room. The first day I gave him these probiotics, his gas was so much better. (Maybe 5 farts). After a few days his gas is GONE. HE LITERALLY DOES NOT HAVE GAS AT ALL! Honestly, this product has improved our lives more than any single product I can think of!!!!! I am AMAZED!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent for my happy dog.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the bottle, I had my doubts and I was disappointed with the active ingredient list, but after using the entire bottle up I am reordering and then I will subscribe so I don't have to worry about running out again. Has made a huge difference in my dog's digestion and mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E. Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: At the time we were having digestive issues with one of our puppies. Name the "poop" problem and she had it. Once we started giving her Amazing Probiotics her digestive issues were gone within 1 week. Now she is happy and so are we. We also give these to our other two dogs as part of their daily regimen as part of their health maintenance. We find the product an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: If you dog is having ear infections due to yeast I would recommend you to give this product a try
customer_reviews.text: We have a border collie mix dog have was having ear infections at least 3 times a year. Our dog would lick the pads on his paws and scratch the infected ear until we could get drops from the vet to help clear the infection. I read other reviews on this product and decided to give it a try. Our dog hasn't had an ear infection in over 7 months since we started him on this product. If you dog is having ear infections due to yeast I would recommend you to give this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Adlai K Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. It worked immediately. My dogs gas is less and their BMs are more solid. One of my labs has always had a sensitive stomach and generally has looser stools. No more! Also, I swear that my older lab who is 13 (same one with the looser stools) has more energy and less soreness due to the joint vitamins. I only give each dog 1 pill per day due to the expense but I may boost it to the recommended dosage. Great product. I definitely recommend this for dogs with sensitive stomachs and/or joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: CloverBee

customer_reviews.title: Great product with quick results for our pup
customer_reviews.text: Our pup was having a really hard time with her tummy/stool. She had been on antibiotics then they put her on more because of her stool issues. Things stayed the same. We ordered this product thinking, what the heck, can't hurt. Within a few days her tummy and everything else was back to normal. She also seems to be a little less sore after long exercise sessions due to the joint health supliment, but she's pretty young so I'm not 100% sure about that.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the other one I was using
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this because the last one I used was a powder and it became as hard as a rock before the jar was finished. It worked well and quieted her tummy problems but only using 1/2 the jar made it too expensive. Unfortunately, this product did not work for my girl at all. I went by reviews instead of doing my own research. After I realized it wasn't helping her tummy I read the label and there's not much probiotic in it. It's got more of the other stuff which has nothing to do with her gut. I'm back to looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Tropigal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps digestion!
customer_reviews.text: Giving to my two senior pups to help with soft stools and occasional diarrhea. Figured why not try the joint version to help with their arthritis. Not sure much change in that area but def improvement with gut and stomach issues. Would recommend to anyone wanting to control occ digestive issues and keep on as maintenance supplement - works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these probiotics for my dogs that have digestive problems. The chews seem to have helped quite a bit. They like the chews and will eat them freely without me having to stick them down his throat like pills that I have used before. These work well to keep my dogs healthy. I like the added benefit of joint pain relief for my older dog.
customer_reviews.author: KristaDD

customer_reviews.title: IT'S ALL GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year old terrier rescue Charley began on this new (to us) probiotic supplement on Friday, 09/26/2014. By Monday, 09/29/2014, he was frisking around the house like a 2-year old! Wanting to play--prancing around like a pony! Just like he knew there were only good things to come. The bald patches on both sides of his hips have totally filled in now, and his demeanor has totally changed, as well. Life is wonderful again; just like when he was a puppy. A spring in his step and a twinkle in his eye....It's All Good!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not really something my dog wants to eat....
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be chewable and your dog will eat them. My dog runs. Doesn't even like to sniff them..so I'm thinking not so much. Why can't there be a chewable that dogs can't wait to eat? I have 5 dogs...none of them are thrilled with this. Though I'm sure its a good product..its not a flavor they like or want.
customer_reviews.author: ConscientiousConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Better than arthritis meds, saved money too.
customer_reviews.text: Found these when the vet suggested probiotics to help my 12 yr old dog’s stomach and digestion when putting her on expensive arthritis meds gave her loose stools. She thought she was getting a treat. Added benefit is she didn’t seem to need her medication most of the time, almost no more crying or limping.
customer_reviews.author: Bella’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with great results!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic is excellent! I have a Great Dane that has a very sensitive digestive track. It doesn't take much to upset his stomach and give him extremely loose stools. I normally keep probiotics on hand to keep his stomach settled, but I had run out. It didn't take long for him to get an upset stomach. I decided to try this brand, because it was a probiotic and joint supplement. I received the product on a Wednesday and immediately opened it and gave two tablets to my Dane. By Thursday his stomach was settled and he was feeling much better. I give him two tablets each day and he hasn't had anymore digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: I was hopeful about these but they gave both my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful about these but they gave both my chihuahuas diarrhea & stomach upset. I tried multiable times to be sure & every time they got runny poop. Save your money & buy separate a probiotic & joint supplement. They do well on forti flora by Purina & for their joints genuine naturals hip & joint chews.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn q.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Really never got the problem under control at all and it was virtually impossible to get Presley to eat them. Yogurt probably would have worked as well and would have been tremendously less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: JennyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Product ingredients caused my dog to regurgitate shortly after eating the product.
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after eating one of the chews my pooch regurgitated her dinner. She had one large barf dump with three other barfs and bile. Needless to say stopped giving her any further chews and want to return the product to the seller for a refund. It's unfortunate this American made product caused such distress. My pooch seemed to like eating the chew and it smelled OK but it certainly disagreed with her stomach. We had to resort to white rice and small bits of chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Giraldi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for joints
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. We adopted a 12 year old minature Daschund that has knee issues and after a few weeks of taking these he is jumping higher and I can barely see the issue. Both my dogs eat these and love them. I call them cookies and the dogs come running. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: but was not as good as aspirin (they make aspirin for dogs- thats what ...
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to help my elderly dog with constipation and gas. It slightly helped her with arthritis pain, but was not as good as aspirin (they make aspirin for dogs- thats what we were using for her previously). When we had her on 1 and 2 pills it only helped her a little bit, but by the time we worked her up to 3 and 4 pills we could tell the difference! She absolutely loved the taste. Every time we shook the pill bottle she would get so excited. She gobbled them up like treats. She had no idea she was taking medicine lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had my male maltese dog on this for quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I had my male maltese dog on this for quite a while and althought there wasn't a big difference in him, I think hope it helped him. I would crush a tablet in a pill crusher and sprinkle it in his food so he'd eat the whole tab. There was no complications or side effects while he was taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my fur baby tremendously
customer_reviews.text: I'm so very happy to have found your product. My dog would suffer at least once a week with stomach issues and therefore would not eat. Since he's been using this product there has not been any problems at all. Also he's only a 10 pound Yorkie so I only give him 1 tablet a day and it helps his stomach and joints. He also had arthitis but he is going on 12. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Did what it claimed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the probiotic joint tablets! My dog loves them, and they do what I was hoping...address her somewhat loose stool issues. I noticed improvement in just a couple of days. ðY~ She was already taking a supplement for joint pain, so these give her an additional boost for that as well. I will definitely keep using these with my dog!

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! Our dog was having intermitant issues with diarrhea ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! Our dog was having intermitant issues with diarrhea and comstipation as well,as taking a prescription for hip pain, and these took care of it all! He now has totally normal bowel movements and we were able to take him off of the vet prescribed pain medication. He is a shih tzu so he only needs one pill a day, so the bottle lasts quite a while. We break it in half and throw it in with his dinner and salmon oil for his skin/coat and he eats it without fuss every night. Please please please never stop making this!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sinnwell

customer_reviews.title: These products work!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is my service dog he was having lots stomach pancreatic issues. I have been giving him these products and he is 90 per cent improved so far! I cannot thank this product enough for great products! I will be a customer forever more! Catherine Lalla-Duckworth
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lalla Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Seems great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually have three dogs, 2 large and the third 128 pounds. I got them primarily for the one dog who seemed to have some digestive issues and was quite gassy, but I do give all three a probiotic each morning. Seems to be working great so far, less gas and the older of the three seems to have more energy so will definitely keep on using them. Bonus the dogs will actually eat the pill - even the fussy one!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Manning

customer_reviews.title: his breath started smelling very bad and farting too
customer_reviews.text: I have a Lab and Border Collie mix.He is 12, very friendly and loves to be with people.Lately, his breath started smelling very bad and farting too.It was very embarrassing with friends and families. The vet said to change his diet.Came across this and started using twice a day morning and evening for the last couple of months. I never changed his diet, and his breath doesn't smell anymore and also stopped farting.I have ordered another bottle last week. So far I haven't seen any side effects.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It has really helped my dog's tummy issues and has given him a spunkier attitude again. It seems to be helping his joints as well, which is wonderful! He isn't excited to take a pill, but will eat these.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time i get these for my dogs. They've accepted it just fine, they eat it as if it was a snack and they will always feel better from their stomach issues and indigestion. It has also relieves my dogs from joint issues thanks to its dual effect. My dogs are happy and they enjoy it! ---
customer_reviews.author: nadia

customer_reviews.title: Happy German Shepherd!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second bottle. Very happy with the results!! We have an 8+ old German Shepherd. She's been showing signs of hip joint pain/weakness. She's also fairly thin. Since taking this for a month, she's much more agile and even gained a little weight. We have a healthy, happy dog again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tooker

customer_reviews.title: use this on my goldens as a preventive.
customer_reviews.text: as dogs age they have a lot of problems with joints. I started them on cosequin" DS. I switched to probiotic as Mike was having stomach issues. I chose this product as it did both for what I wanted for my goldens.

customer_reviews.title: and the best part is I don't have to give multiple different ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying many diffrent brands of joint support and probiotics this is the only one that my senior dog will eat! She would not touch any of the others but she loves these, and the best part is I don't have to give multiple different pills since it is both probiotic and joint support in one! It has helped a lot with her gas and tummy troubles. I am going to continue with this product.
customer_reviews.author: COEUR D'OR

customer_reviews.title: No more limping lab
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after my female lab began limping after her 20 min. walks. I was hoping that it would help her joints. She is lean but round and has smaller legs. I have been giving all of my dogs this product and they are energetic, healthy and best of all my female dog does not limp anymore. I am very pleased with this product and recommend it to everyone I know with a dog. These are our babies. We have to take care of them so they can take care of us!
customer_reviews.author: G. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: It really works! Our 8 year old Min Pin was having digestive issues and seemed arthritic. He was losing weight and seemed to walk with some difficulty and pain. Our vet prescribed a special gastrointestinal diet, it seemed to help, but did nothing to address his joint issue. I saw all the positive reviews and gave this product a try. I'm so glad I did! After three weeks, our dog was his old self. He was running which he hadn't done in almost a year! He had renewed vigor and gained weight! This product is so good, our finicky cat comes up and asks for a pill sometimes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MBHobsonTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Save me from having to use multple products
customer_reviews.text: Really love these because they're easy to give to your dog and is both a probiotic and a joint supplement that saves me from buying multiple products or messy powders. I have a 100 lbs Golden Retriever and his joints are fine I'm giving it to him for maintenance then anything because he's my mobility service dog and he's going to be turning 7 this year. What I've definitely noticed is his stools are firmer and easier to pick up. So, that helps a lot. I would recommend this to anyone even if your dog is fine. just to void problems in the future. I just wish they would make a larger pill for larger dogs
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Brockmeyer

customer_reviews.title: No more bad gas!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Our 13 year old dog has had terrible, clear-the-room gas for months. We've been giving him one tab with each meal for a week now and has not had stinky gas since the first day we gave it to him. As far as joint relief, our dog didn't have serious issues, but we're hoping this product will help keep his joints healthier longer.
customer_reviews.author: mommymudd

customer_reviews.title: Great product- working well for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a second bottle. My dog does seem to be moving better than before and his BMs have firmed up. He has chronic pancreatitis and loose stool is always a problem. With these, he has the best of both worlds. It is a pretty good buy for the price and helps with supplementing two meds he needs with one product. He is picky and does eat these in his food without much of a problem. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: It made my dog sick! 2 days of throwing ...
customer_reviews.text: It made my dog sick! 2 days of throwing up and massive diarrhea, stopped the supplement my dog was back to normal! I wish would have worked, will try something different
customer_reviews.author: maria rutz

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with ear issues
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeding my dog Greek yogurt to help stave off yeast infections in his ears. It worked beautifully, but he stopped wanting to eat it. I searched to find this supplement, and I've been giving it to my dog for about six weeks. It seems to be working well. My dog loves the tablets -- he drools when he hears me open the bottle! He weighs 60 pounds, and I give him three tablets a day.
customer_reviews.author: Willow67

customer_reviews.title: No adverse reactions to this product even for a dog with allergies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try and improve my dog's gut health and allergies. She is doing well with this product. So far there are no adverse reactions. However, she still suffers from itchness from time to time even though I can see she is getting better. Will continue to monitor and feed her this product. Hopefully it will help her out and her fur will grow back slowly. Thanks for this great product!
customer_reviews.author: WINNE SEE

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and follow up!! Product arrived when promised. My dog loves it! She's 10 and had been slowing down s bit. Her energy level seemed to increase after a couple of weeks. Gave 4 stars instead of only because her stool isn't where I had hoped it would be by 3rd week. I do think the probiotics are making a difference in a good way. Will continue to use this product and see how it goes. This product is exactly what I was looking for. Thank you! Also your customer service is exemplary. It's refreshing to deal with someone who doesn't just take your money and disappear!
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 weeks and a full bottle, my dog has gotten minimal results. She's had chronic bowel issues since a very serious intestinal infection as a small pup almost killed her, and has a LOT of gas, along with regular belly aches and diarrhea. She happily eats these, which was a nice surprise since she's so finicky, but it didn't help much. Her gas is the same, and still seems to have bad belly days, but her stool quality has improved a bit. This is the second product that hasn't helped my girl, so onto the next.
customer_reviews.author: Secondhand Limbs

customer_reviews.title: This product does not control gas..
customer_reviews.text: This product said it would help with gas and it did not. The problem got worse after taking this probiotic. She did like the flavor so I didn't have a problem giving them to her. I missed the return window because we were trying to use the process of elimination and this one was last. It also gave her bad breath, something she had never had before
customer_reviews.author: angie sturgis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these probiotics for my dog for about 3 months. I was looking for something that helped with his digestive issues and his joints and saw these. They are decent. I'm not sure they are 100% working, but he does take them like candy; and I think they are reasonably priced. His vet okayed them, so we will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! HAS STOP OUR HOUNDS GAS PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF IS AWESOME! Has stopped my hounds from farting! No lies here people! When you have 5 hounds, it can be toxic. But this has put it to rest my friends. Their bowels are so much better now. I give them 1 pill each per day.

customer_reviews.title: Digestive nightmare
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these for the first few days. But then I noticed that they started to give him HORRIBLE diarrhea. This was the only change in diet. So I stopped giving them to him. He started to do better. I then waited a number of weeks before trying again...diarrhea for 5 days straight. I threw these in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! First of all, the customer service has been unparalleled. Seller checked in with me to see how the tabs were working out with my dog. We have a large breed (95 lbs) female who has been getting diarrhea and (what appears to be) upset stomach issues out of the blue, and these tabs have finally taken care of all that. An added bonus: she loves chewing them, they are like a treat to her, and she gets 2 a day, one with each meal. Absolutely worth it and makes for a happy dog tummy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTea

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! It helped our 13 year old dog immediately! He was having diarrhea & I took a chance on these. The diarrhea stopped after one tablet! It's also helping his arthritis. He's back to his old self. They're now a daily part of his regime.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna D

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for my dog...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My 5 year old rescue dog used to have frequent upset stomach issues and he has arthritis. Since taking this product, he has been tremendously better! The Probiotics help his sensitive tummy and the Glucosamine helps his joints. At times, he used to struggle to stand and walk up the stairs. Not anymore. Highly recommend it! And he loves the taste - it’s like giving him a treat! I would definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: this item keeps popping up as the best diarrhea treatment and it DOES NOTHING to stop diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: okay as a probiotic. Worthless if you need diarrhea treatment...this item keeps popping up as the best diarrhea treatment and it DOES NOTHING to stop diarrhea. It is a diarrhea preventative not a treatment.
customer_reviews.author: weshophere

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer, these have made a huge difference in both my dogs. One, because she has a sensitive gut, and these really work on her digestive system and gas (she's not clearing the room anymore); and on our older gal, who just wasn't so spry anymore. A week on these, and she definitely had a lot of the spring in her step back! The dogs think they are treats, no stuffing into something to disguise them!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Dackiewicz

customer_reviews.title: And he's always been a pretty healthy eater
customer_reviews.text: My little westie has always had issues with vomiting. And he's always been a pretty healthy eater, but it would have been a miracle if he lasted a whole week without vomiting at least once. We were just told that it was a common thing for his breed...that was then. Now, he hasn't had many issues with vomiting after a month of taking his Probiotic. It's really quite amazing! So far, he's only thrown up once. At first, he wouldn't take the tablets, but now he actually eats them as if they are his treats every day. I'm very satisfied with the results and I couldn't ask for a better outcome.
customer_reviews.author: F.B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and my dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs had diarrhea frequently and the older one, a Beagle, had back pain. Before we started with this supplement (about 6 months ago), we were at the vet at least once a month! I spent about $300 every month! Since I started with this supplement my dogs had NO diarrhea at all and the Beagle’s back pain has gotten so much better! I can’t be happier! It’s a pricey supplement, but it’s totally worth it! In the end it saved my a lot of money and my dogs feel so much better! They also seem to like the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I have to break the pills in half for my dog to take. Since she has been taking the probiotics, she hasn't had diarrhea like she had previously. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just received
customer_reviews.text: I just received them yesterday, my almost 13 yr old long haired Chihuahua seems to like them. She's only 11 pounds, so I broke it half for her. I will update review after they have had a chance to work
customer_reviews.author: Hunnie

customer_reviews.title: Doing Well
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are doing fine. The West Highland Terrier, as a purebred dog, is the animal with skin allergies. We have shifted his diet to a grain free product. This took care of his skin problems and we were able to stop the immunosuppressant (Atopica) without recurrence. Stools were a bit loose with this new diet. We added probiotics to his diet and he is acting 4 years younger. Stools have been well formed. We have not had any recurrence of the skin allergies. This product is helping keep ole Zach going.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Heck

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dog's gas discharge
customer_reviews.text: This has been a help in decreasing the amount of gas my dog emits. However, my dog will NOT chew any pills, not just this one, so I wish they were a little easier to crush and hide in her food.
customer_reviews.author: M31749

customer_reviews.title: He Likes It!
customer_reviews.text: Our doggy was having trouble with his digestion, diarrhea, vet gave him probiotics when that finished we ordered these. He really loves them, thinks he’s getting a treat.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT  {UPDATE}
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN UPDATED REVIEW. EMMA LOU IS DOING REAL WELL WITH NO STOMACH ISSUES. SHE FEELS BETTER TOO SINCE SHE IS RUNNING THROUGH THE HOUSE WHEN I PLAY WITH HER. ALMOST LIKE A PUPPY EVEN THOUGH SHE IS ALMOST 11 YEARS. I DO BELIEVE HER JOINTS AND STOMACH FEEL BETTER SO SHE IS MORE ENERGETIC. IT IS FUN FOR ME TOO SINCE WE HURT WHEN OUR PETS HURT. SO I THANK YOU VERY MUCH AND I WILL CONTINUE TO USE THIS PRODUCT. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TO THE PET OWNERS OUT THERE AND WILL BE HAPPY TO ANSWER ANY QUESTIONS IF I CAN.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Picone

customer_reviews.title: My poor dog was having potty accidents in his sleep
customer_reviews.text: My poor dog was having potty accidents in his sleep! These supplements saved his tummy, our wallet and our bedsheets! Best part, there was no worrying about having to shove them into a "pill-pocket" or change his diet because he loves them! We give it to him as a reward / treat everyday. As an added bonus our little guy is getting up there in age and we're already aware of the fact that he has arthritis. The doctor recommended probiotics and glucosomin, it's amazing to find it all in one convenient package!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Past expiration date, DON"T order
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for not checking the expiration date, already expired 4 months prior to my ordering this product. Bad odor, but they say "it has a strong smell", however my dog has been sick, finally figured out these are bad and causing his illness. Shame on Amazon for selling bad and expired product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: He isn’t fond of the flavor so I wrap it in Liverwurst.
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t an instant fix. You need to give it to your dog every day. It has worked for the diarrhea but who knows with the joints. My dog is active and always has been. He is an English Bulldog a very active playful one and I hope to help stay healthy. If this helps I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Pashon

customer_reviews.title: He is more playful and happy. He still shows some signs of joint problems ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I noticed a difference in my dog after about 3 to 4 weeks. He is more playful and happy. He still shows some signs of joint problems and I think the joint support in this is a lot less than other joint only supplements. I think the probiotics are making a difference overall. The only thing I don't like is the dosage instructions. It is very general, so you don't know how much to really give whether your dog is 10 pounds or he's 100 pounds. My dog wouldn't eat the plain tablet but it breaks up very easy and I put it with a little bit of canned food and he ate it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: CK T.

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of probiotics and glucosamine.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on these probiotics for a while now. She was having major digestive issues and these have certainly helped with that . In addition, the glucosamine really helps with her joints and she is more playful than ever. She is able to jump up again and seems to have an easier time moving around.We add two pills to her food each morning and she eats them right up. You could even uses them as treats if you like.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin21

customer_reviews.title: It seems to have worked for Charlie!
customer_reviews.text: This product was given to our Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. Prior to its use, he was scratching and biting quite a bit. We originally thought this was due to fleas, but none were found. After about a week of using the Probiotics, he has almost completely stopped his scratching/biting. And, no digestive issues have popped up either.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Small and tasty
customer_reviews.text: We needed more probiotic and the dogs love the taste of these. I like that there’s glucosamine too. I give a few extra to meet to ingredient percent of our old brand.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but less effective
customer_reviews.text: It is not as effective as the powder one. The only good thing about it is that it is more convenient to feed that's all. The products may work for other dogs but just not my puppies However, I must say that this is a great vendor. They contacted me once I received the product to see if I have it in hand, and follow up to see if it's working great or not. I will purchase from this vendor again if they have other products.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Treats
customer_reviews.text: They actually smell ok. Not like artificial meat scent. My 2 dogs like them. No complaints. Good for their tummies and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Nutritionals is a winner
customer_reviews.text: My dog scoshi, a lhasa also looks forward to taking her probiotic following a meal. They agree with her, and her stools are more regular.
customer_reviews.author: Anne berrett

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier! If anything changes I’ll update my review
customer_reviews.text: These were sent from heaven!!!! My 105lb Rottweiler used to have diahreah everyday, new food never worked to relieve it. Finally he’s been on these for 2 weeks and has maybe had 1 loose-ish stool. Couldn’t be happier! If anything changes I’ll update my review, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: CC@amazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These supplements are amazing! Our puggle has not cleared the room with her “wind” from the very first pill. If your dog is gassy, these work great.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement!
customer_reviews.text: All of my dogs love these and the reduction in flatulence is very welcome! The added benefit of joint support makes this a absolute monthly addition to my dog care!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R. Strait

customer_reviews.title: Improved Walk but throwing up
customer_reviews.text: Our Pit Bull has had bad hips since she was a pup. The first couple of weeks there did seem to be improvement in her walking. The last week or or so she’s thrown up her food everyday. I don’t know if it’s the pills, but for now we are going to stop giving it to her.
customer_reviews.author: DDG22 Sailor

customer_reviews.title: My dog is recovering from a TPLO surgery for a ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is recovering from a TPLO surgery for a torn ACL. I read about this product and decided to order it. My dog stands in front of the cabinet now waiting for her next "treat". She loves the taste and I believe it helps her digest her food easier. She had to be on pain medication which would upset her but it stopped bothering her once she got on this probiotic. I figured it would help in her joint healing as well.
customer_reviews.author: A health conscience grandma

customer_reviews.title: Its a must have.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I have a geriatric Boston Terrier, who due to age, was having some elimination and gas issues. We started him on this product and it has helped immensely. I give him the max dosage as well as a gas med for dogs. This is a must have in our house.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stop the stink!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a member of our family, no doubt. He's doing well. He is a Portuguese Water Dog, weighing in at 65 lbs, and is just over two years old. We feed him 2x a day, and give him one tablet with each meal. While he does not like the tablet well enough to eat it directly, he will happily eat it when broken into his dry kibble. It really helps with his breath and his gas. If we skip a day, he will start to have terrible gas again, so we stay pretty consistent! We will continue to be a customer!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Griffin

customer_reviews.title: My Lady is like a child to me
customer_reviews.text: My Lady is like a child to me. She is a 10-year-old, 108 lb Akbash. She is diabetic (needs insulin injections) and has hypothyroidism. Both are under control, but she had developed some arthritis and digestive issues which prompted me to start her on supplements. She’s on a couple different vitamins, but the probiotic is definitely helping her. I’m fairly confident that the combination of supplements is right for her. She is getting around easier, and her digestion seems like it’s back on track. She’s taking 2 of the probiotic tablets daily, and that seems about right. I will definitely order more when my supply gets low.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kern

customer_reviews.title: We Love Healthy Dogs
customer_reviews.text: We really like this. It helps with our dogs digestion and may actually help with other problems. We use one tablet in each of the dogs dinner which we feed in the morning and at night. It has really seemed to help our big Great Pyrenees puppy mill boy that had very limited nutrition before we fostered him. We have one Great Pyrenees that has some stomach issues and this helps to keep her straight. She likes them and they are not distasteful to the other dogs either.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our dog's loose stool
customer_reviews.text: We have a 50 pound lab that is 8 months old. She was having loose stool and the vet suggested probiotics. We give her two in the morning and she eats them as if they are a treat. They are working.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! A+++
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent! A+++ My dog loves these pills like a treat right out of the bottle so no messy disguises needed (Peanut butter, pill pouches etc) - It's also great that this product combines multiple supplements so I don't have to worry about dosing things separately I have an 8yr old German Shepherd in very good health, but I do notice more activity, friskiness since she's been on these (for about a month now) I also see healthier, consistent stools so the probiotic seems to be doing the job too! I would highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Razzetti

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 9 year old Cavalier King Charles Spaniel and he was experiencing diarrhea. My vet sold me some packets of powder to sprinkle over his food but it seemed like he wasn't getting it all because there was always powder in the bottom of his bowl. I saw this product and thought it would be worth a try and it worked great! I keep him on it all the time now and he is doing terrific plus NO MORE DIARRHEA !
customer_reviews.author: LS Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Helping my dog with stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: Helps my dog with going potty easier and seems to also help with her hips. She has been on it for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with this company's support!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome vendor and a great product! I was really impressed with the follow up e-mail(s) received from the creator of this product - he actually took time to write & assess the needs of my dog & offered genuine concern for my pets health. Was unexpected, but appreciated. I am using this product to rejuvenate my Labrador's health since recently learning that the dog food I had been feeding him was poorer quality than he I believed. This is a digestive supplement & joint rejuvenator. Will follow up when I have had time to assess. Great people though, and definitely recommend this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased with the results of this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with the results of your product and will be re-ordering regularly. I have an English Bulldog and have been battling yeast issues with his nose rope and tail pocket. With wipes and creams we have been able to treat the issues, but not been able to eliminate the yeast. Your product have taken care of this. He is 64lbs and gets one chew in the morning and evening and doesn't mind the taste. The joint additives is an extra benefit for him, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Really works and my dogs love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product really seems to help with my Rottys hips and her walking, she is even running and bouncing around again..
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I gave this a try
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far! I've only been giving this to my dogs for about a week, but so far, so good! One of my dogs has an especially sensitive stomach and is doing well on this so far. No vomiting or accidents. I love that it is helpful for joints too. Win-win. I was mixing up probiotic powder in their food every day, but this is so much easier and my dogs think it's a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be helping his digestive system and his hips also
customer_reviews.text: Our dog takes these easily with little bit of cheese wrapped around it. They are not too thick or hard. This appears to be helping him.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: My GSD always had some digestive issues. This product really helped with her stomach/intestinal trouble. Even better, the additional glucosamine and condroitin, combined with another glucosamine supplement, lessened the discomfort from her arthritis. My dog thought the tablets were treats, so I never had a problem with her taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Kila's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Dog still farts
customer_reviews.text: I adopted an older bulldog mix who farts A LOT, so I bought these specifically for that. After finishing the bottle, he still farts A LOT. I really didn't see any difference while he was taking these probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Pet hasn't decided
customer_reviews.text: Pet is taking this product daily, however, he doesn't seem thrilled by it. We have used it for two weeks, too early to determine results. I would buy again though
customer_reviews.author: Little Lulu

customer_reviews.title: This has really helped our dog
customer_reviews.text: We love this product !!! Our 10 year old Lakeland terrier has always had digestive troubles and bad breath due to this. After giving him this product, he is an eager eager once again and is able to keep his food down. Thank you for making Probiotic Joint supplements available. We will definitely keep ordering......great product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: It must have a good flavor because my boy will not take anything that is medicine. Our big guy loves these and takes them with no problem. He is doing so well on them he hasn’t cried since about a week after we started them. He has hip and knee dysplasia. He runs now and wants to play.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Works well even for picky eaters..
customer_reviews.text: Our fur babies like this product and will even eagerly accept it as a treat. I usually break the tablet into four pieces and mix it into their kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelie L.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy bottle but my dogs love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: So good my dog chewed into the bottle and ate atleast a 100 of these! My dog snagged these off the counter while I was out shopping. Definitely need a solid dog proof bottle smh. Ordering more and putting in a safer location! Still great product and does wonders for my four dogs!
customer_reviews.author: beanpole
